Prerequisite(s): 3 Roaring Mouse maneuvers
Range: Melee attack
Target: One creature
Duration: Instantaneous (see text)

Description

You hit â€˜em where it hurts, keeping your foes gasping in pain. Make an attack. If it hits, you deal damage as normal plus [[6d6]] additional damage and the target is tricked for a number of rounds equal to your initiation modifier. In addition, the target must make a Fortitude save (DC 17 + initiation modifier) or be nauseated for three rounds. If the target succeeds, they are merely sickened instead. Exploit: The target is stunned if they fail the save, or staggered if they succeed. Upon using this exploit, the foe is immune to this exploit for six rounds.
